8.11 DUIM-Gadgets Module

gadget-mnemonic

Generic function

Summary

Returns the mnemonic for the specified gadget.

Signature

gadget-mnemonic gadget => mnemonic

Arguments

gadget
An instance of type <gadget>.

Values

mnemonic
An instance of type false-or(<character>).

Library

duim-gadgets

Module

duim-gadgets

Description

Returns the mnemonic for gadget. On Windows, the mnemonic is displayed as an underlined character in the label of the gadget, and pressing the key for that character activates the gadget or gives it the focus.

See also

gadget-accelerator, page 552

gadget-mnemonic-setter, page 573

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
